LoginForm.title: Log in to the admin panel

Step1.title: Surface Selection
Step1.question: What will be on the terrace?

Step2.distanceBetweenJoistsInfo: Distance between joists under the slab
Step2.distanceBetweenSupports: Distance between supports under the joist (mm.)
Step2.distanceBetweenSupportsPlaceholderInfo: Distance between supports under the joist
Step2.errorLowestGreater: Value for: "Lowest support (mm.)" cannot be greater than value for: "Highest support (mm.)"
Step2.errorLowestLess: Value for: "Lowest support (mm.)" cannot be less than 10mm
Step2.errorHighestLess: Value for: "Highest support (mm.)" cannot be less than value for: "Lowest support (mm.)"
Step2.errorHighestGreater: Value for: "Highest support (mm.)" cannot be greater than 950mm

Step4.title: System
Step4.warning: Warning - select the main support system to be used. If the height ranges will exceed the ranges of a given type, the program will select the missing heights from another type.
Step4.selectSurfaceFirst: Select the type of terrace surface (point 1), without this data we will not be able to display the support system

Step5.title: Additional accessories for supports
Step5.selectSurfaceFirst: Select the type of terrace surface (point 1), without this data we will not be able to display the list of accessories

modal.title: Next step
modal.description: In the next step, you have the option to manually add products from the entire ddgro range. This is an additional step that allows you to add additional products to the order. If you don't want to add additional products, click the "Go to summary" button in the bottom right corner.
modal.addProducts: Yes, I want to add additional products manually
modal.goToSummary: No, I'm going to the summary

Step6.title: Add additional product quantities manually
Step6.warning: Note: additional step allowing manual addition of products, can be skipped without selecting any option
Step6.skipInfo: If you don't want to add products manually

FormAside.title: Get PDF with individual offer
FormAside.privacyPolicy: We will process your personal data to answer your question. The administrator of your personal data is "DECK-DRY" Sp. z o.o. You have the right to object, right of access to data, right to request rectification, deletion or limitation of their processing, as well as their transfer. Detailed information can be found in our Privacy Policy.
FormAside.genericErrorMessage: An error occurred while sending the form. Please try again later.
